event_details.event_name: Bitcoin to be priced at 97398.00 USDT or more at 05:00 AM?

price_expert_advice.sell_confirm_text: Do you still want to trade at No'?

data.title: Set Price
data.body: Set the price at which you want to buy. Order will be executed when qty is available at this price

data.title: Instant match
data.body: Get instant matched in range of ₹0.5 from Market price, based on available qty in this price range.

quantity.title: Select quantity limit
quantity.action_message: Minimum balance of ₹10,000 is required to set a slider limit of 20000.

investment.title: Select investment limit
investment.action_message: Minimum balance of ₹10,000 is required to set a slider limit of 25000.

tds_info.text: 31.2 % TDS will be deducted on orders with profit more than ₹10,000

tooltip_data.advanced_options: Introducing advance options to improve your trading experience
tooltip_data.book_profit: Set book profit to exit automatically
tooltip_data.stop_loss: Set stop loss to exit automatically

book_profit.label: Book Profit

error_labels.wrong_price_selected: Book profit price should be greater than trade price.
error_labels.max_price_selected: Book profit can not be set when trade price is 9.5
error_labels.wrong_quantity_selected: Book profit quantities should be less than or equal to trade quantities.
error_labels.highest_price_selected: Book profit price cannot be higher than ₹%s
error_labels.lowest_price_selected: Book profit price cannot be less than ₹%s

warning_labels.price_changed: Book profit price needs to be updated.
warning_labels.disabled: Book profit can not be set when trade price is 9.5

book_profit.info_message: Exit will be placed at set book profit price right after order is completely matched.

stop_loss.label: Stop Loss

error_labels.wrong_price_selected: Stop loss price should be less than trade price.
error_labels.min_price_selected: Stop loss can not be set when trade price is less than 1.5
error_labels.wrong_quantity_selected: Stop loss quantities should be less than or equal to trade quantities.
error_labels.highest_price_selected: Stop loss price cannot be higher than ₹%s
error_labels.lowest_price_selected: Stop loss price cannot be less than ₹%s

warning_labels.price_changed: Stop loss price needs to be updated.
warning_labels.disabled: Stop loss can not be set when trade price is 0.5

stop_loss.info_message: Exit will be placed at stop loss price after Market Price reaches stop loss price

error_labels.min_minutes_selected: Auto Cancel can not be set below %s minutes
error_labels.max_minutes_selected: Auto Cancel can not be set beyond %s minutes
